## IKeyManagerSignArgs interface

Input arguments for [keyManagerSign](./core.ikeymanager.keymanagersign.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IKeyManagerSignArgs
```

## Properties

| Property                                              | Type                                                 | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| ----------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [algorithm?](./core.ikeymanagersignargs.algorithm.md) | string                                               | <i>(Optional)</i> The algorithm to use for signing. This must be one of the algorithms supported by the KMS for this key type. The algorithm used here should match one of the names listed in <code>IKey.meta.algorithms</code> |
| [data](./core.ikeymanagersignargs.data.md)            | string                                               | Data to sign                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [encoding?](./core.ikeymanagersignargs.encoding.md)   | 'utf-8' &#124; 'base16' &#124; 'base64' &#124; 'hex' | <i>(Optional)</i> If the data is a "string" then you can specify which encoding is used. Default is "utf-8"                                                                                                                      |
| [keyRef](./core.ikeymanagersignargs.keyref.md)        | string                                               | The key handle, as returned during <code>keyManagerCreateKey</code>                                                                                                                                                              |
